◆ anticonvulsant()

int iuse::anticonvulsant ( player *  p,
item *  it,
bool  ,
const tripoint &   
)
Strength reduces duration of anticonvulsant medication

Definition at line 776 of file iuse.cpp.

777{
778 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You take some anticonvulsant medication." ) );
779 /** @EFFECT_STR reduces duration of anticonvulsant medication */
780 time_duration duration = 8_hours - p->str_cur * rng( 0_turns, 10_minutes );
781 if( p->has_trait( trait_TOLERANCE ) ) {
782 duration -= 1_hours;
783 }
784 if( p->has_trait( trait_LIGHTWEIGHT ) ) {
785 duration += 2_hours;
786 }
787 p->add_effect( effect_valium, duration );
788 if( p->has_effect( effect_shakes ) ) {
789 p->remove_effect( effect_shakes );
790 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You stop shaking." ) );
791 }
792 return it->type->charges_to_use();
793}
rng

714 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
715 return 0;
716 }
717 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You take some antifungal medication." ) );

719 p->remove_effect( effect_fungus );

721 _( "You feel a burning sensation under your skin that quickly fades away." ) );

Definition at line 731 of file iuse.cpp.

732{
733 if( p->is_underwater() ) {
734 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
735 return 0;
736 }
737 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You take some antiparasitic medication." ) );
738 if( p->has_effect( effect_dermatik ) ) {
739 p->remove_effect( effect_dermatik );
740 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The itching sensation under your skin fades away." ) );
741 }
742 if( p->has_effect( effect_tapeworm ) ) {
743 p->remove_effect( effect_tapeworm );
744 if( p->has_trait( trait_NOPAIN ) ) {
745 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Your bowels clench as something inside them dies." ) );
746 } else {
747 p->add_msg_if_player( m_mixed, _( "Your bowels spasm painfully as something inside them dies." ) );
748 p->mod_pain( rng( 8, 24 ) );
749 }
750 }
751 if( p->has_effect( effect_bloodworms ) ) {
752 p->remove_effect( effect_bloodworms );
753 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Your skin prickles and your veins itch for a few moments." ) );
754 }
755 if( p->has_effect( effect_brainworms ) ) {
756 p->remove_effect( effect_brainworms );
757 if( p->has_trait( trait_NOPAIN ) ) {
758 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The pressure inside your head feels better already." ) );
759 } else {
760 p->add_msg_if_player( m_mixed,
761 _( "Your head pounds like a sore tooth as something inside of it dies." ) );
762 p->mod_pain( rng( 8, 24 ) );
763 }
764 }
765 if( p->has_effect( effect_paincysts ) ) {
766 p->remove_effect( effect_paincysts );
767 if( p->has_trait( trait_NOPAIN ) ) {
768 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The stiffness in your joints goes away." ) );
769 } else {
770 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The pain in your joints goes away." ) );
771 }
772 }
773 return it->type->charges_to_use();
774}

5172{
5173 if( p->is_npc() ) {
5174 // TODO: Allow this for trusting NPCs
5175 return 0;
5176 }
5177

5179 debugmsg( "iuse::artifact called on a non-artifact item! %s",
5180 it->tname() );
5181 return 0;
5182 } else if( !it->is_tool() ) {
5183 debugmsg( "iuse::artifact called on a non-tool artifact! %s",
5184 it->tname() );
5185 return 0;
5186 }
5187 g->events().send<event_type::activates_artifact>( p->getID(), it->tname( 1, false ) );
5188
5189 const auto &art = it->type->artifact;
5190 size_t num_used = rng( 1, art->effects_activated.size() );
5191 if( num_used < art->effects_activated.size() ) {
5192 num_used += rng( 1, art->effects_activated.size() - num_used );
5193 }
5194
5195 std::vector<art_effect_active> effects = art->effects_activated;
5196 for( size_t i = 0; i < num_used && !effects.empty(); i++ ) {
5197 const art_effect_active used = random_entry_removed( effects );
5198
5199 switch( used ) {
5200 case AEA_STORM: {
5201 sounds::sound( p->pos(), 10, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Ka-BOOM!" ), true, "environment",
5202 "thunder_near" );

5204 for( int j = 0; j < num_bolts; j++ ) {
5205 point dir;
5206 while( dir.x == 0 && dir.y == 0 ) {
5207 dir.x = rng( -1, 1 );
5208 dir.y = rng( -1, 1 );
5209 }
5210 int dist = rng( 4, 12 );
5211 point bolt( p->posx(), p->posy() );
5212 for( int n = 0; n < dist; n++ ) {
5213 bolt.x += dir.x;
5214 bolt.y += dir.y;
5215 g->m.add_field( {bolt, p->posz()}, fd_electricity, rng( 2, 3 ) );
5216 if( one_in( 4 ) ) {
5217 if( dir.x == 0 ) {
5218 dir.x = rng( 0, 1 ) * 2 - 1;
5219 } else {
5220 dir.x = 0;
5221 }
5222 }
5223 if( one_in( 4 ) ) {
5224 if( dir.y == 0 ) {
5225 dir.y = rng( 0, 1 ) * 2 - 1;
5226 } else {
5227 dir.y = 0;
5228 }
5229 }
5230 }
5231 }
5232 }
5233 break;
5234
5235 case AEA_FIREBALL: {
5236 if( const cata::optional<tripoint> fireball = g->look_around() ) {
5237 explosion_handler::explosion( *fireball, 180, 0.5, true );
5238 }
5239 }
5240 break;
5241
5242 case AEA_ADRENALINE:
5243 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You're filled with a roaring energy!" ) );
5244 p->add_effect( effect_adrenaline, rng( 20_minutes, 25_minutes ) );
5245 break;
5246
5247 case AEA_MAP: {

5253 }
5254 }
5255 break;
5256
5257 case AEA_BLOOD: {
5258 bool blood = false;

5260 if( !one_in( 4 ) && g->m.add_field( tmp, fd_blood, 3 ) &&
5261 ( blood || g->u.sees( tmp ) ) ) {
5262 blood = true;
5263 }
5264 }
5265 if( blood ) {
5266 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Blood soaks out of the ground and walls." ) );
5267 }
5268 }
5269 break;
5270
5271 case AEA_FATIGUE: {

5274 g->m.add_field( {p2, p->posz()}, fd_fatigue, rng( 1, 2 ) );
5275 }
5276 break;
5277
5278 case AEA_ACIDBALL: {

5280 for( const tripoint &tmp : g->m.points_in_radius( *acidball, 1 ) ) {
5281 g->m.add_field( tmp, fd_acid, rng( 2, 3 ) );
5282 }
5283 }
5284 }
5285 break;

5292 g->m.bash( pt, 40 ); // Multibash effect, so that doors &c will fall
5293 g->m.bash( pt, 40 );
5294 if( g->m.is_bashable( pt ) && rng( 1, 10 ) >= 3 ) {
5295 g->m.bash( pt, 999, false, true );
5296 }
5297 }
5298 break;
5299
5300 case AEA_HEAL:
5301 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You feel healed." ) );
5302 p->healall( 2 );
5303 break;
5304
5305 case AEA_CONFUSED:

5308 mon->add_effect( effect_stunned, rng( 5_turns, 15_turns ) );
5309 }
5310 }
5311 break;
5312

5316 if( mon && mon->friendly == 0 && rng( 0, 600 ) > mon->get_hp() ) {
5317 mon->make_friendly();
5318 }
5319 }
5320 break;
5321
5322 case AEA_BUGS: {
5323 int roll = rng( 1, 10 );
5324 mtype_id bug = mtype_id::NULL_ID();
5325 int num = 0;
5326 if( roll <= 4 ) {
5327 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Flies buzz around you." ) );
5328 } else if( roll <= 7 ) {
5329 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Giant flies appear!" ) );
5330 bug = mon_fly;
5331 num = rng( 2, 4 );
5332 } else if( roll <= 9 ) {
5333 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Giant bees appear!" ) );
5334 bug = mon_bee;
5335 num = rng( 1, 3 );
5336 } else {
5337 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Giant wasps appear!" ) );
5338 bug = mon_wasp;
5339 num = rng( 1, 2 );
5340 }
5341 if( bug ) {
5342 for( int j = 0; j < num; j++ ) {
5343 if( monster *const b = g->place_critter_around( bug, p->pos(), 1 ) ) {
5344 b->friendly = -1;
5345 b->add_effect( effect_pet, 1_turns, num_bp );
5346 }
5347 }
5348 }
5349 }
5350 break;
5351
5352 case AEA_TELEPORT:
5353 teleport::teleport( *p );
5354 break;
5355
5356 case AEA_LIGHT:

5359 break;
5360
5361 case AEA_GROWTH: {

5364 }
5365 break;
5366
5367 case AEA_HURTALL:

5370 }
5371 break;
5372

5377 }

5379

5383 // masochists & Cenobites the stimulation they've been

5387

5390 p->mutate();
5391 }
5392 break;

5397 break;
5398
5399 case AEA_FIRESTORM: {

5410 case AEA_ATTENTION:

5425

5428 string_format( _( "a disturbing scream from %s %s" ),
5429 p->disp_name( true ), it->tname() ), true, "shout", "scream" );
5430 if( !p->is_deaf() ) {

5432 }
5433 break;
5434
5435 case AEA_DIM:
5436 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The sky starts to dim." ) );
5437 g->timed_events.add( TIMED_EVENT_DIM, calendar::turn + 5_minutes );
5438 break;
5439
5440 case AEA_FLASH:

5442 explosion_handler::flashbang( p->pos(), false, "explosion" );
5443 break;
5444
5445 case AEA_VOMIT:
5446 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "A wave of nausea passes through you!" ) );
5447 p->vomit();
5448 break;
5449
5450 case AEA_SHADOWS: {
5451 int num_shadows = rng( 4, 8 );
5452 int num_spawned = 0;
5453 for( int j = 0; j < num_shadows; j++ ) {
5454 for( int tries = 0; tries < 10; ++tries ) {
5455 tripoint monp = p->pos();
5456 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
5457 monp.x = rng( p->posx() - 5, p->posx() + 5 );
5458 monp.y = ( one_in( 2 ) ? p->posy() - 5 : p->posy() + 5 );
5459 } else {
5460 monp.x = ( one_in( 2 ) ? p->posx() - 5 : p->posx() + 5 );
5461 monp.y = rng( p->posy() - 5, p->posy() + 5 );
5462 }
5463 if( !g->m.sees( monp, p->pos(), 10 ) ) {
5464 continue;
5465 }
5466 if( monster *const spawned = g->place_critter_at( mon_shadow, monp ) ) {
5467 num_spawned++;
5468 spawned->reset_special_rng( "DISAPPEAR" );
5469 break;
5470 }
5471 }
5472 }
5473 if( num_spawned > 1 ) {
5474 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Shadows form around you." ) );
5475 } else if( num_spawned == 1 ) {
5476 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "A shadow forms nearby." ) );
5477 }
5478 }
5479 break;
5480
5481 case AEA_STAMINA_EMPTY:
5482 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your body feels like jelly." ) );
5483 p->set_stamina( p->get_stamina() * 1 / ( rng( 3, 8 ) ) );
5484 break;
5485
5486 case AEA_FUN:
5487 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You're filled with euphoria!" ) );
5488 p->add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, rng( 20, 50 ), 0, 5_minutes, 5_turns, false );
5489 break;
5490
5491 case AEA_SPLIT:
5492 // TODO: Add something
5493 break;
5494
5495 case AEA_NULL:
5496 // BUG
5497 case NUM_AEAS:
5498 default:
5499 debugmsg( "iuse::artifact(): wrong artifact type (%d)", used );
5500 break;
5501 }
5502 }

5034{
5035 if( p->is_mounted() ) {
5036 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
5037 return 0;
5038 }
5039 const std::set<ter_id> allowed_ter_id {
5040 t_chaingate_l,
5041 t_chainfence
5042 };
5043 const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f = [&allowed_ter_id]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
5044 if( pnt == g->u.pos() ) {
5045 return false;
5046 }
5047 const ter_id ter = g->m.ter( pnt );
5048 const bool is_allowed = allowed_ter_id.find( ter ) != allowed_ter_id.end();
5049 return is_allowed;
5050 };
5051
5052 const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
5053 _( "Cut up metal where?" ), _( "There is no metal to cut up nearby." ), f, false );
5054 if( !pnt_ ) {
5055 return 0;
5056 }
5057 const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
5058 const ter_id type = g->m.ter( pnt );
5059 if( !f( pnt ) ) {
5060 if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
5061 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
5062 _( "You neatly sever all of the veins and arteries in your body. Oh wait, Never mind." ) );
5063 } else {
5064 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't cut that." ) );
5065 }
5066 return 0;
5067 }
5068
5069 if( type == t_chaingate_l ) {
5070 p->moves -= to_moves<int>( 1_seconds );
5071 g->m.ter_set( pnt, t_chaingate_c );
5072 sounds::sound( pnt, 5, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Gachunk!" ), true, "tool", "boltcutters" );
5073 g->m.spawn_item( point( p->posx(), p->posy() ), "scrap", 3 );
5074 } else if( type == t_chainfence ) {
5075 p->moves -= to_moves<int>( 5_seconds );
5076 g->m.ter_set( pnt, t_chainfence_posts );
5077 sounds::sound( pnt, 5, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Snick, snick, gachunk!" ), true, "tool",
5078 "boltcutters" );
5079 g->m.spawn_item( pnt, "wire", 20 );
5080 } else {
5081 return 0;
5082 }
5083
5084 return it->type->charges_to_use();
5085}

3343{
3344 if( p->is_npc() ) {
3345 // Long action
3346 return 0;
3347 }
3348 if( p->is_mounted() ) {
3349 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
3350 return 0;
3351 }
3352 if( p->is_underwater() ) {
3353 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
3354 return 0;
3355 }
3356
3357 tripoint pnt = pos;
3358 if( pos == p->pos() ) {
3359 const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Burrow where?" ) );
3360 if( !pnt_ ) {
3361 return 0;
3362 }
3363 pnt = *pnt_;
3364 }
3365
3366 if( !g->m.has_flag( "MINEABLE", pnt ) ) {
3367 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't burrow there." ) );
3368 return 0;
3369 }
3370 if( g->m.veh_at( pnt ) ) {
3371 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There's a vehicle in the way!" ) );
3372 return 0;
3373 }
3374
3375 int moves = to_moves<int>( 5_minutes );
3376 moves += ( ( MAX_STAT + 3 ) - std::min( p->str_cur, MAX_STAT ) ) * to_moves<int>( 2_minutes );
3377 if( g->m.move_cost( pnt ) == 2 ) {
3378 // We're breaking up some flat surface like pavement, which is much easier
3379 moves /= 2;
3380 }
3381 p->assign_activity( ACT_BURROW, moves, -1, 0 );
3382 p->activity.placement = pnt;
3383 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You start tearing into the %1$s with your %2$s." ),
3384 g->m.tername( pnt ), it->tname() );
3385 return 0; // handled when the activity finishes
3386}

8820 const bool has_solar_pack = p->worn_with_flag( "SOLARPACK" );
8821 const bool has_solar_pack_on = p->worn_with_flag( "SOLARPACK_ON" );
8822 const bool wearing_solar_pack = has_solar_pack || has_solar_pack_on;
8823 const bool has_ups = p->has_charges( itype_UPS_off, 1 ) || p->has_charges( itype_adv_UPS_off, 1 );
8824
8825 item_location loc;
8826 avatar *you = p->as_avatar();
8827
8828 auto filter = [&]( const item & itm ) {
8829 return itm.has_flag( "IS_UPS" );
8830 };
8831
8832 const std::string choose_ups = _( "Choose UPS:" );
8833 const std::string dont_have_ups = _( "You don't have any UPS." );
8834
8835 const auto set_cable_active = []( player * p, item * it, const std::string & state ) {
8836 const std::string prev_state = it->get_var( "state" );
8837 it->set_var( "state", state );
8838 it->active = true;
8839 it->process( p, p->pos(), false );
8840 p->moves -= 15;
8841
8842 if( !prev_state.empty() && ( prev_state == "cable_charger" || ( prev_state != "attach_first" &&
8843 ( state == "cable_charger_link" || state == "cable_charger" ) ) ) ) {
8844 p->find_remote_fuel();
8845 }
8846 };
8847 if( initial_state == "attach_first" ) {
8848 if( has_bio_cable ) {
8849 uilist kmenu;
8850 kmenu.text = _( "Using cable:" );
8851 kmenu.addentry( 0, true, -1, _( "Attach cable to vehicle" ) );
8852 kmenu.addentry( 1, true, -1, _( "Attach cable to self" ) );
8853 if( wearing_solar_pack ) {
8854 kmenu.addentry( 2, has_solar_pack_on, -1, _( "Attach cable to solar pack" ) );
8855 }
8856 if( has_ups ) {
8857 kmenu.addentry( 3, true, -1, _( "Attach cable to UPS" ) );
8858 }
8859 kmenu.query();
8860 int choice = kmenu.ret;
8861
8862 if( choice < 0 ) {
8863 return 0; // we did nothing.
8864 } else if( choice == 1 ) {
8865 set_cable_active( p, it, "cable_charger" );
8866 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You attach the cable to your Cable Charger System." ) );
8867 return 0;
8868 } else if( choice == 2 ) {
8869 set_cable_active( p, it, "solar_pack" );
8870 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You attach the cable to the solar pack." ) );
8871 return 0;
8872 } else if( choice == 3 ) {
8873 if( you != nullptr ) {
8874 loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( filter, *you, choose_ups, dont_have_ups );
8875 }
8876 if( !loc ) {
8877 add_msg( _( "Never mind" ) );
8878 return 0;
8879 }
8880 item &chosen = *loc;
8881 chosen.set_var( "cable", "plugged_in" );
8882 chosen.activate();
8883 set_cable_active( p, it, "UPS" );
8884 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You attach the cable to the UPS." ) );
8885 return 0;
8886 }
8887 // fall through for attaching to a vehicle
8888 }
8889 const cata::optional<tripoint> posp_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Attach cable to vehicle where?" ) );
8890 if( !posp_ ) {
8891 return 0;
8892 }
8893 const tripoint posp = *posp_;
8894 const optional_vpart_position vp = g->m.veh_at( posp );
8895 if( !vp ) {
8896 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There's no vehicle there." ) );
8897 return 0;
8898 } else {
8899 const auto abspos = g->m.getabs( posp );
8900 it->set_var( "source_x", abspos.x );
8901 it->set_var( "source_y", abspos.y );
8902 it->set_var( "source_z", abspos.z );
8903 set_cable_active( p, it, "pay_out_cable" );
8904 }
8905 } else {
8906 const auto confirm_source_vehicle = []( player * p, item * it, const bool detach_if_missing ) {
8907 tripoint source_global( it->get_var( "source_x", 0 ),
8908 it->get_var( "source_y", 0 ),
8909 it->get_var( "source_z", 0 ) );
8910 tripoint source_local = g->m.getlocal( source_global );
8911 const optional_vpart_position source_vp = g->m.veh_at( source_local );
8912 vehicle *const source_veh = veh_pointer_or_null( source_vp );
8913 if( detach_if_missing && source_veh == nullptr ) {
8914 if( p != nullptr && p->has_item( *it ) ) {
8915 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You notice the cable has come loose!" ) );
8916 }
8917 it->reset_cable( p );
8918 }
8919 return source_vp;
8920 };
8921
8922 const bool paying_out = initial_state == "pay_out_cable";
8923 const bool cable_cbm = initial_state == "cable_charger";
8924 const bool solar_pack = initial_state == "solar_pack";
8925 const bool UPS = initial_state == "UPS";
8926 bool loose_ends = paying_out || cable_cbm || solar_pack || UPS;
8927 uilist kmenu;
8928 kmenu.text = _( "Using cable:" );
8929 kmenu.addentry( 0, true, -1, _( "Detach and re-spool the cable" ) );
8930 kmenu.addentry( 1, ( paying_out || cable_cbm ) && !solar_pack &&
8931 !UPS, -1, _( "Attach loose end to vehicle or grid connector" ) );
8932
8933 if( has_bio_cable && loose_ends ) {
8934 kmenu.addentry( 2, !cable_cbm, -1, _( "Attach loose end to self" ) );
8935 if( wearing_solar_pack ) {
8936 kmenu.addentry( 3, !solar_pack && !paying_out && !UPS, -1, _( "Attach loose end to solar pack" ) );
8937 }
8938 if( has_ups ) {
8939 kmenu.addentry( 4, !UPS && !solar_pack && !paying_out, -1, _( "Attach loose end to UPS" ) );
8940 }
8941 }
8942 kmenu.query();
8943 int choice = kmenu.ret;
8944
8945 if( choice < 0 ) {
8946 return 0; // we did nothing.
8947 } else if( choice == 0 ) { // unconnect & respool
8948 p->reset_remote_fuel();
8949 it->reset_cable( p );
8950 return 0;
8951 } else if( choice == 2 ) { // connect self while other end already connected
8952 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You attach the cable to the Cable Charger System." ) );
8953 // connecting self, solar backpack connected
8954 if( solar_pack ) {
8955 set_cable_active( p, it, "solar_pack_link" );
8956 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged to the solar backpack." ) );
8957 return 0;
8958 }
8959 // connecting self, UPS connected
8960 if( UPS ) {
8961 set_cable_active( p, it, "UPS_link" );
8962 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged to the UPS." ) );
8963 return 0;
8964 }
8965 // connecting self, vehicle connected
8966 const optional_vpart_position source_vp = confirm_source_vehicle( p, it, true );
8967 if( veh_pointer_or_null( source_vp ) != nullptr ) {
8968 set_cable_active( p, it, "cable_charger_link" );
8969 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged to the vehicle." ) );
8970 }
8971 return 0;
8972 } else if( choice == 3 ) {
8973 // connecting self to solar backpack
8974 set_cable_active( p, it, "solar_pack_link" );
8975 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged to the solar backpack." ) );
8976 return 0;
8977 } else if( choice == 4 ) {
8978 loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( filter, *you, choose_ups, dont_have_ups );
8979 // connecting self to UPS
8980 if( !loc ) {
8981 add_msg( _( "Never mind" ) );
8982 return 0;
8983 }
8984 item &chosen = *loc;
8985 chosen.set_var( "cable", "plugged_in" );
8986 chosen.activate();
8987 set_cable_active( p, it, "UPS_link" );
8988 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged to the UPS." ) );
8989 return 0;
8990 }
8991 // connecting self to vehicle
8992 const optional_vpart_position source_vp = confirm_source_vehicle( p, it, paying_out );
8993 vehicle *const source_veh = veh_pointer_or_null( source_vp );
8994 if( source_veh == nullptr && paying_out ) {
8995 return 0;
8996 }
8997
8998 const cata::optional<tripoint> vpos_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Attach cable where?" ) );
8999 if( !vpos_ ) {
9000 return 0;
9001 }
9002 const tripoint vpos = *vpos_;
9003
9004 const optional_vpart_position target_vp = g->m.veh_at( vpos );
9005 tripoint_abs_ms target_global( g->m.getabs( vpos ) );
9006 vehicle_connector_tile *grid_connection = active_tiles::furn_at<vehicle_connector_tile>
9007 ( target_global );
9008 if( !target_vp && !grid_connection ) {
9009 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There's no vehicle or grid connection there." ) );
9010 return 0;
9011 } else if( cable_cbm ) {
9012 const auto abspos = g->m.getabs( vpos );
9013 it->set_var( "source_x", abspos.x );
9014 it->set_var( "source_y", abspos.y );
9015 it->set_var( "source_z", g->get_levz() );
9016 set_cable_active( p, it, "cable_charger_link" );
9017 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged to the vehicle." ) );
9018 return 0;
9019 } else {
9020 tripoint source_global( it->get_var( "source_x", 0 ),
9021 it->get_var( "source_y", 0 ),
9022 it->get_var( "source_z", 0 ) );
9023 const vpart_id vpid( it->typeId().str() );
9024
9025 point vcoords = source_vp->mount();
9026 vehicle_part source_part( vpid, vcoords, item( *it ) );
9027 if( grid_connection != nullptr ) {
9028 source_part.target.first = target_global.raw();
9029 source_part.target.second = target_global.raw();
9030 source_part.set_flag( vehicle_part::targets_grid );
9031 if( p != nullptr && p->has_item( *it ) ) {
9032 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You connect the %s to the electric grid." ),
9033 source_veh->name );
9034 grid_connection->connected_vehicles.emplace_back( g->m.getabs( source_veh->global_pos3() ) );
9035 source_veh->install_part( vcoords, source_part );
9036 }
9037 } else {
9038 vehicle *const target_veh = &target_vp->vehicle();
9039 if( source_veh == target_veh ) {
9040 if( p != nullptr && p->has_item( *it ) ) {
9041 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "The %s already has access to its own electric system!" ),
9042 source_veh->name );
9043 }
9044 return 0;
9045 }
9046
9047 source_part.target.first = target_global.raw();
9048 source_part.target.second = target_veh->global_square_location().raw();
9049 source_veh->install_part( vcoords, source_part );
9050
9051 if( target_vp ) {
9052 vcoords = target_vp->mount();
9053 vehicle_part target_part( vpid, vcoords, item( *it ) );
9054 target_part.target.first = source_global;
9055 target_part.target.second = source_veh->global_square_location().raw();
9056 target_veh->install_part( vcoords, target_part );
9057
9058 if( p != nullptr && p->has_item( *it ) ) {
9059 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You link up the electric systems of the %1$s and the %2$s." ),
9060 source_veh->name, target_veh->name );
9061 }
9062 }
9063 }
9064
9065 return 1; // Let the cable be destroyed.
9066 }
9067 }
9068
9069 return 0;
9070}

7495 !it->get_var( "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" ).empty();
7496 bool found_monster_photos = !it->get_var( "CAMERA_MONSTER_PHOTOS" ).empty();
7497
7498 uilist amenu;
7499 amenu.text = _( "What to do with camera?" );
7500 amenu.addentry( c_shot, true, 't', _( "Take a photo" ) );
7501 if( !found_extended_photos && !found_monster_photos ) {
7502 amenu.addentry( c_photos, false, 'l', _( "No photos in memory" ) );
7503 } else {
7504 if( found_extended_photos ) {
7505 amenu.addentry( c_photos, true, 'l', _( "List photos" ) );
7506 }

7511 }
7512

7515
7516 if( choice < 0 ) {
7517 return 0;
7518 }
7519
7520 if( c_shot == choice ) {
7521 const cata::optional<tripoint> aim_point_ = g->look_around();
7522
7523 if( !aim_point_ ) {
7524 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
7525 return 0;
7526 }
7527 tripoint aim_point = *aim_point_;
7528 bool incorrect_focus = false;

7530
7531 std::vector<tripoint> trajectory = line_to( p->pos(), aim_point, 0, 0 );
7532 trajectory.push_back( aim_point );
7533
7534 p->moves -= 50;
7535 sounds::sound( p->pos(), 8, sounds::sound_t::activity, _( "Click." ), true, "tool",
7536 "camera_shutter" );
7537
7538 for( std::vector<tripoint>::iterator point_it = trajectory.begin();
7539 point_it != trajectory.end();
7540 ++point_it ) {
7541 const tripoint trajectory_point = *point_it;
7542 if( point_it != trajectory.end() ) {
7543 const tripoint next_point = *( point_it + 1 ); // Trajectory ends on last visible tile

7545 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You have the wrong camera focus." ) );
7546 incorrect_focus = true;
7547 // recalculate target point
7548 aim_point = trajectory_point;
7549 aim_bounds = g->m.points_in_radius( trajectory_point, 2 );
7550 }
7551 }
7552
7553 monster *const mon = g->critter_at<monster>( trajectory_point, true );
7554 player *const guy = g->critter_at<player>( trajectory_point );

7556 int dist = rl_dist( p->pos(), trajectory_point );
7557
7558 int camera_bonus = it->has_flag( "CAMERA_PRO" ) ? 10 : 0;
7559 int photo_quality = 20 - rng( dist, dist * 2 ) * 2 + rng( camera_bonus / 2, camera_bonus );
7560 if( photo_quality > 5 ) {
7561 photo_quality = 5;
7562 }
7563 if( photo_quality < 0 ) {
7564 photo_quality = 0;
7565 }
7566 if( p->is_blind() ) {
7567 photo_quality /= 2;
7568 }
7569
7570 if( mon ) {
7571 monster &z = *mon;
7572
7573 // shoot past small monsters and hallucinations
7574 if( trajectory_point != aim_point && ( z.type->size <= MS_SMALL || z.is_hallucination() ||
7575 z.type->in_species( HALLUCINATION ) ) ) {
7576 continue;
7577 }
7578 if( !aim_bounds.is_point_inside( trajectory_point ) ) {
7579 // take a photo of the monster that's in the way
7580 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "A %s got in the way of your photo." ), z.name() );
7581 incorrect_focus = true;
7582 } else if( trajectory_point != aim_point ) { // shoot past mon that will be in photo anyway
7583 continue;
7584 }
7585 // get an special message if the target is a hallucination
7586 if( trajectory_point == aim_point && ( z.is_hallucination() ||
7587 z.type->in_species( HALLUCINATION ) ) ) {
7588 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Strange there's nothing in the center of picture?" ) );
7589 }
7590 } else if( guy ) {
7591 if( trajectory_point == aim_point && guy->is_hallucination() ) {
7592 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Strange %s's not visible on the picture?" ), guy->name );
7593 } else if( !aim_bounds.is_point_inside( trajectory_point ) ) {
7594 // take a photo of the monster that's in the way
7595 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "%s got in the way of your photo." ), guy->name );
7596 incorrect_focus = true;
7597 } else if( trajectory_point != aim_point ) { // shoot past guy that will be in photo anyway
7598 continue;
7599 }
7600 }
7601 if( incorrect_focus ) {
7602 photo_quality = photo_quality == 0 ? 0 : photo_quality - 1;
7603 }
7604
7605 std::vector<extended_photo_def> extended_photos;
7606 std::vector<monster *> monster_vec;
7607 std::vector<player *> player_vec;
7608 extended_photo_def photo = photo_def_for_camera_point( trajectory_point, p->pos(), monster_vec,
7609 player_vec );
7610 photo.quality = photo_quality;
7611
7612 try {
7613 item_read_extended_photos( *it, extended_photos, "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" );
7614 extended_photos.push_back( photo );
7615 item_write_extended_photos( *it, extended_photos, "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" );
7616 } catch( const JsonError &e ) {
7617 debugmsg( "Error when adding new photo (loaded photos = %i): %s", extended_photos.size(),
7618 e.c_str() );
7619 }
7620
7621 const bool selfie = std::find( player_vec.begin(), player_vec.end(), p ) != player_vec.end();
7622
7623 if( selfie ) {
7624 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You took a selfie." ) );
7625 } else {
7626 if( p->is_blind() ) {
7627 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You took a photo of %s." ), photo.name );
7628 } else {
7629 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You took a photo of %1$s. It is %2$s." ), photo.name,
7630 photo_quality_name( photo_quality ) );
7631 }
7632 std::vector<std::string> blinded_names;
7633 for( monster * const &monster_p : monster_vec ) {
7634 if( dist < 4 && one_in( dist + 2 ) && monster_p->has_flag( MF_SEES ) ) {
7635 monster_p->add_effect( effect_blind, rng( 5_turns, 10_turns ) );
7636 blinded_names.push_back( monster_p->name() );
7637 }
7638 }
7639 for( player * const &player_p : player_vec ) {
7640 if( dist < 4 && one_in( dist + 2 ) && !player_p->is_blind() ) {
7641 player_p->add_effect( effect_blind, rng( 5_turns, 10_turns ) );
7642 blinded_names.push_back( player_p->name );
7643 }
7644 }
7645 if( !blinded_names.empty() ) {
7646 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "%s looks blinded." ), enumerate_as_string( blinded_names.begin(),
7647 blinded_names.end(), []( const std::string & it ) {
7648 return colorize( it, c_light_blue );
7649 } ) );
7650 }
7651 }
7652 if( !monster_vec.empty() ) {
7653 item_save_monsters( *p, *it, monster_vec, photo_quality );
7654 }
7655 return it->type->charges_to_use();
7656 }
7657 }
7658 return it->type->charges_to_use();
7659 }
7660
7661 if( c_photos == choice ) {
7662 show_photo_selection( *p, *it, "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" );
7663 return it->type->charges_to_use();
7664 }
7665
7666 if( c_monsters == choice ) {
7667 if( p->is_blind() ) {
7668 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't see the camera screen, you're blind." ) );
7669 return 0;
7670 }
7671 uilist pmenu;
7672
7673 pmenu.text = _( "Your collection of monsters:" );
7674
7675 std::vector<mtype_id> monster_photos;
7676 std::vector<std::string> descriptions;
7677
7678 std::istringstream f_mon( it->get_var( "CAMERA_MONSTER_PHOTOS" ) );
7679 std::string s;
7680 int k = 0;
7681 while( getline( f_mon, s, ',' ) ) {
7682
7683 if( s.empty() ) {
7684 continue;
7685 }
7686
7687 monster_photos.push_back( mtype_id( s ) );
7688
7689 std::string menu_str;
7690
7691 const monster dummy( monster_photos.back() );
7692 menu_str = dummy.name();
7693 descriptions.push_back( dummy.type->get_description() );
7694
7695 getline( f_mon, s, ',' );
7696 char *chq = &s[0];
7697 const int quality = atoi( chq );
7698
7699 menu_str += " [" + photo_quality_name( quality ) + "]";
7700
7701 pmenu.addentry( k++, true, -1, menu_str.c_str() );
7702 }
7703
7704 int choice;
7705 do {
7706 pmenu.query();
7707 choice = pmenu.ret;
7708
7709 if( choice < 0 ) {
7710 break;
7711 }
7712
7713 popup( "%s", descriptions[choice].c_str() );
7714
7715 } while( true );
7716
7717 return it->type->charges_to_use();
7718 }
7719
7720 if( c_upload == choice ) {
7721
7722 if( p->is_blind() ) {
7723 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't see the camera screen, you're blind." ) );
7724 return 0;
7725 }
7726
7727 p->moves -= to_moves<int>( 2_seconds );
7728
7729 avatar *you = p->as_avatar();
7730 item_location loc;
7731 if( you != nullptr ) {
7732 loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( []( const item & it ) {
7733 return it.has_flag( "MC_MOBILE" );
7734 }, *you, _( "Insert memory card" ) );
7735 }
7736 if( !loc ) {
7737 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have that item!" ) );
7738 return it->type->charges_to_use();
7739 }
7740 item &mc = *loc;
7741
7742 if( !mc.has_flag( "MC_MOBILE" ) ) {
7743 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This is not a compatible memory card." ) );
7744 return it->type->charges_to_use();
7745 }
7746
7747 init_memory_card_with_random_stuff( mc );
7748
7749 if( mc.has_flag( "MC_ENCRYPTED" ) ) {
7750 if( !query_yn( _( "This memory card is encrypted. Format and clear data?" ) ) ) {
7751 return it->type->charges_to_use();
7752 }
7753 }
7754 if( mc.has_flag( "MC_HAS_DATA" ) ) {
7755 if( !query_yn( _( "Are you sure you want to clear the old data on the card?" ) ) ) {
7756 return it->type->charges_to_use();
7757 }
7758 }
7759
7760 mc.convert( itype_mobile_memory_card );
7761 mc.clear_vars();
7762 mc.unset_flags();
7763 mc.set_flag( "MC_HAS_DATA" );
7764
7765 mc.set_var( "MC_MONSTER_PHOTOS", it->get_var( "CAMERA_MONSTER_PHOTOS" ) );
7766 mc.set_var( "MC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS", it->get_var( "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" ) );
7767 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
7768 _( "You upload your photos and monster collection to memory card." ) );
7769
7770 return it->type->charges_to_use();
7771 }
7772
7773 return it->type->charges_to_use();
7774}

3539 }
3540 }

9266 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot capture a creature mounted." ) );
9267 return 0;
9268 }
9269 if( it->has_var( "contained_name" ) ) {
9270 // Remember contained_name for messages after release_monster erases it
9271 const std::string contained_name = it->get_var( "contained_name", "" );
9272
9273 if( it->release_monster( pos ) ) {
9274 // It's been activated somewhere where there isn't a player or monster, good.
9275 return 0;
9276 }
9277 if( it->has_flag( "PLACE_RANDOMLY" ) ) {
9278 if( it->release_monster( p->pos(), 1 ) ) {
9279 return 0;
9280 }
9281 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There is no place to put the %s." ), contained_name );
9282 return 0;
9283 } else {
9284 const std::string query = string_format( _( "Place the %s where?" ), contained_name );
9285 const cata::optional<tripoint> pos_ = choose_adjacent( query );
9286 if( !pos_ ) {
9287 return 0;
9288 }
9289 if( it->release_monster( *pos_ ) ) {
9290 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You release the %s." ), contained_name );
9291 return 0;
9292 }
9293 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot place the %s there!" ), contained_name );
9294 return 0;
9295 }
9296 } else {
9297 if( !it->has_property( "monster_size_capacity" ) ) {
9298 debugmsg( "%s has no monster_size_capacity.", it->tname() );
9299 return 0;
9300 }
9301 const std::string capacity = it->get_property_string( "monster_size_capacity" );
9302 if( Creature::size_map.count( capacity ) == 0 ) {
9303 debugmsg( "%s has invalid monster_size_capacity %s.",
9304 it->tname(), capacity.c_str() );
9305 return 0;
9306 }
9307 const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> adjacent_capturable = []( const tripoint & pnt ) {
9308 const monster *mon_ptr = g->critter_at<monster>( pnt );
9309 return mon_ptr != nullptr;
9310 };
9311 const std::string query = string_format( _( "Grab which creature to place in the %s?" ),
9312 it->tname() );
9313 const cata::optional<tripoint> target_ = choose_adjacent_highlight( query,
9314 _( "There is no creature nearby you can capture." ), adjacent_capturable, false );
9315 if( !target_ ) {
9316 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot use a %s there." ), it->tname() );
9317 return 0;
9318 }
9319 const tripoint target = *target_;
9320
9321 // Capture the thing, if it's on the target square.
9322 if( const monster *const mon_ptr = g->critter_at<monster>( target ) ) {
9323 const monster &f = *mon_ptr;
9324
9325 if( f.get_size() > Creature::size_map.find( capacity )->second ) {
9326 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %1$s is too big to put in your %2$s." ),
9327 f.type->nname(), it->tname() );
9328 return 0;
9329 }
9330 // TODO: replace this with some kind of melee check.
9331 int chance = f.hp_percentage() / 10;
9332 // A weaker monster is easier to capture.
9333 // If the monster is friendly, then put it in the item
9334 // without checking if it rolled a success.
9335 if( f.friendly != 0 || one_in( chance ) ) {
9336 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You capture the %1$s in your %2$s." ),
9337 f.type->nname(), it->tname() );
9338 return it->contain_monster( target );
9339 } else {
9340 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The %1$s avoids your attempts to put it in the %2$s." ),
9341 f.type->nname(), it->type->nname( 1 ) );
9342 }
9343 p->moves -= to_moves<int>( 1_seconds );
9344 } else {
9345 add_msg( _( "The %s can't capture nothing" ), it->tname() );
9346 return 0;
9347 }
9348 }
9349 return 0;
9350}

◆ crowbar()

int iuse::crowbar ( player *  p,
item *  it,
bool  ,
const tripoint &  pos 
)
Strength speeds up crowbar prying attempts Strength increases chance of crowbar prying success Strength reduces chance of breaking window with crowbar Mechanics reduces chance of breaking window with crowbar

Definition at line 2417 of file iuse.cpp.

2418{
2419 if( p->is_mounted() ) {
2420 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
2421 return 0;
2422 }
2423 const pry_result *pry = nullptr;
2424 bool pry_furn;
2425
2426 const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> can_pry = [&p]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
2427 if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
2428 return false;
2429 }
2430 const ter_id ter = g->m.ter( pnt );
2431 const furn_id furn = g->m.furn( pnt );
2432
2433 const bool is_allowed = ter->pry.pry_quality != -1 || furn->pry.pry_quality != -1;
2434 return is_allowed;
2435 };
2436
2437 const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = ( pos != p->pos() ) ? pos : choose_adjacent_highlight(
2438 _( "Pry where?" ), _( "There is nothing to pry nearby." ), can_pry, false );
2439 if( !pnt_ ) {
2440 return 0;
2441 }
2442 const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
2443 const ter_id ter = g->m.ter( pnt );
2444 const furn_id furn = g->m.furn( pnt );
2445
2446 if( !can_pry( pnt ) ) {
2447 if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
2448 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You attempt to pry open your wallet "
2449 "but alas. You are just too miserly." ) );
2450 } else if( !ter->has_flag( "LOCKED" ) && ter->open ) {
2451 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You notice the door is unlocked, so you simply open it." ) );
2452 g->m.ter_set( pnt, ter->open );
2453 } else {
2454 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't pry that." ) );
2455 }
2456
2457 return 0;
2458 }
2459
2460 if( furn->pry.pry_quality != -1 ) {
2461 pry_furn = true;
2462 pry = &furn->pry;
2463 } else {
2464 pry_furn = false;
2465 pry = &ter->pry;
2466 }
2467
2468 // Doors need PRY 2 which is on a crowbar, crates need PRY 1 which is on a crowbar
2469 // & a claw hammer.
2470 // The iexamine function for crate supplies a hammer object.
2471 // So this stops the player (A)ctivating a Hammer with a Crowbar in their backpack
2472 // then managing to open a door.
2473 const int pry_level = it->get_quality( quality_id( "PRY" ) );
2474
2475 if( pry_level < pry->pry_quality ) {
2476 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't get sufficient leverage to open that with your %s." ),
2477 it->tname() );
2478 p->mod_moves( 10 ); // spend a few moves trying it.
2479 return 0;
2480 }
2481
2482 // For every level of PRY over the requirement, remove n from the difficulty.
2483 // Then multiply n by pry_bonus_mult. It's recommended that you don't allow
2484 // the result to be negative if you can help it.
2485 int diff = pry->difficulty;
2486 diff -= ( ( pry_level - pry->pry_quality ) * pry->pry_bonus_mult );
2487
2488 /** @EFFECT_STR speeds up crowbar prying attempts */
2489 p->mod_moves( -std::max( 20, diff * 50 - p->str_cur * 10 ) );
2490 /** @EFFECT_STR increases chance of crowbar prying success */
2491
2492 if( dice( 4, diff ) < dice( 4, p->str_cur ) ) {
2493 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, pry->success_message );
2494
2495 if( pry_furn ) {
2496 g->m.furn_set( pnt, pry->new_furn_type );
2497 } else {
2498 g->m.ter_set( pnt, pry->new_ter_type );
2499 }
2500
2501 if( pry->noise > 0 ) {
2502 sounds::sound( pnt, pry->noise, sounds::sound_t::combat, pry->sound, true, "tool", "crowbar" );
2503 }
2504 g->m.spawn_items( pnt, item_group::items_from( pry->pry_items, calendar::turn ) );
2505 if( pry->alarm ) {
2506 g->events().send<event_type::triggers_alarm>( p->getID() );
2507 sounds::sound( p->pos(), 40, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "an alarm sound!" ), true, "environment",
2508 "alarm" );
2509 if( !g->timed_events.queued( TIMED_EVENT_WANTED ) ) {
2510 g->timed_events.add( TIMED_EVENT_WANTED, calendar::turn + 30_minutes, 0,
2511 p->global_sm_location() );
2512 }
2513 }
2514 } else {
2515 if( pry->breakable ) {
2516 //chance of breaking the glass if pry attempt fails
2517 /** @EFFECT_STR reduces chance of breaking window with crowbar */
2518
2519 /** @EFFECT_MECHANICS reduces chance of breaking window with crowbar */
2520 if( dice( 4, diff ) > ( dice( 2, p->get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) ) + dice( 2,
2521 p->str_cur ) ) * pry_level ) {
2522 p->add_msg_if_player( m_mixed, pry->break_message );
2523 sounds::sound( pnt, pry->break_noise, sounds::sound_t::combat, pry->break_sound, true, "smash",
2524 "door" );
2525 if( pry_furn ) {
2526 g->m.furn_set( pnt, pry->break_furn_type );
2527 } else {
2528 g->m.ter_set( pnt, pry->break_ter_type );
2529 }
2530 g->m.spawn_items( pnt, item_group::items_from( pry->break_items, calendar::turn ) );
2531 if( pry->alarm ) {
2532 g->events().send<event_type::triggers_alarm>( p->getID() );
2533 sounds::sound( p->pos(), 40, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "an alarm sound!" ), true, "environment",
2534 "alarm" );
2535 if( !g->timed_events.queued( TIMED_EVENT_WANTED ) ) {
2536 g->timed_events.add( TIMED_EVENT_WANTED, calendar::turn + 30_minutes, 0,
2537 p->global_sm_location() );
2538 }
2539 }
2540 return it->type->charges_to_use();
2541 }
2542 }
2543 p->add_msg_if_player( pry->fail_message );
2544 }
2545 return it->type->charges_to_use();
2546}

2129{
2130 // Find out if we have an active radio
2131 auto radios = p->items_with( []( const item & it ) {
2132 return it.typeId() == itype_radio_on;
2133 } );
2134 // If we don't wield the radio, also check on the ground
2135 if( radios.empty() ) {
2136 map_stack items = get_map().i_at( p->pos() );
2137 for( item &an_item : items ) {
2138 if( an_item.typeId() == itype_radio_on ) {
2139 radios.push_back( &an_item );
2140 }
2141 }
2142 }
2143 if( radios.empty() ) {
2144 add_msg( m_info, _( "Must have an active radio to check for signal direction." ) );
2145 return 0;
2146 }
2147 const item radio = *radios.front();
2148 // Find the radio station its tuned to (if any)
2149 const auto tref = overmap_buffer.find_radio_station( radio.frequency );
2150 if( !tref ) {
2151 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't find the direction if your radio isn't tuned." ) );
2152 return 0;
2153 }
2154 // Report direction.
2155 // TODO: fix point types
2156 const tripoint_abs_sm player_pos( p->global_sm_location() );
2157 direction angle = direction_from( player_pos.xy(), tref.abs_sm_pos );
2158 add_msg( _( "The signal seems strongest to the %s." ), direction_name( angle ) );
2159 return it->type->charges_to_use();
2160}

9196 }

9203 hologram->set_summon_time( 60_seconds );

4289 }
4290 return it->type->charges_to_use();

6516 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You turned off music on your %s." ), it->tname() );

6518 it->active = true;
6519 it->set_var( "EIPC_MUSIC_ON", "1" );
6520
6521 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You turned on music on your %s." ), it->tname() );
6522
6523 }
6524
6525 return it->type->charges_to_use();
6526 }
6527
6528 if( ei_recipe == choice ) {
6529 p->moves -= 50;
6530
6531 uilist rmenu;
6532
6533 rmenu.text = _( "List recipes:" );
6534
6535 std::vector<recipe_id> candidate_recipes;
6536 std::istringstream f( it->get_var( "EIPC_RECIPES" ) );
6537 std::string s;
6538 int k = 0;
6539 while( getline( f, s, ',' ) ) {
6540
6541 if( s.empty() ) {
6542 continue;
6543 }
6544
6545 candidate_recipes.emplace_back( s );
6546
6547 const auto &recipe = *candidate_recipes.back();
6548 if( recipe ) {
6549 rmenu.addentry( k++, true, -1, recipe.result_name() );
6550 }
6551 }
6552
6553 rmenu.query();
6554
6555 return it->type->charges_to_use();
6556 }
6557
6558 if( ei_uploaded_photos == choice ) {
6559 show_photo_selection( *p, *it, "EIPC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" );
6560 return it->type->charges_to_use();
6561 }
6562
6563 if( ei_monsters == choice ) {
6564
6565 uilist pmenu;
6566
6567 pmenu.text = _( "Your collection of monsters:" );
6568
6569 std::vector<mtype_id> monster_photos;
6570
6571 std::istringstream f( it->get_var( "EINK_MONSTER_PHOTOS" ) );
6572 std::string s;
6573 int k = 0;
6574 while( getline( f, s, ',' ) ) {
6575 if( s.empty() ) {
6576 continue;
6577 }
6578 monster_photos.push_back( mtype_id( s ) );
6579 std::string menu_str;
6580 const monster dummy( monster_photos.back() );
6581 menu_str = dummy.name();
6582 getline( f, s, ',' );
6583 char *chq = &s[0];
6584 const int quality = atoi( chq );
6585 menu_str += " [" + photo_quality_name( quality ) + "]";
6586 pmenu.addentry( k++, true, -1, menu_str.c_str() );
6587 }
6588
6589 int choice;
6590 do {
6591 pmenu.query();
6592 choice = pmenu.ret;
6593
6594 if( choice < 0 ) {
6595 break;
6596 }
6597
6598 const monster dummy( monster_photos[choice] );
6599 popup( dummy.type->get_description() );
6600 } while( true );
6601 return it->type->charges_to_use();
6602 }
6603
6604 avatar *you = p->as_avatar();
6605 item_location loc;
6606 auto filter = []( const item & it ) {
6607 return it.has_flag( "MC_MOBILE" );
6608 };
6609 const std::string title = _( "Insert memory card" );
6610
6611 if( ei_download == choice ) {
6612
6613 p->moves -= to_moves<int>( 2_seconds );
6614
6615 if( you != nullptr ) {
6616 loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( filter, *you, title );
6617 }
6618 if( !loc ) {
6619 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have that item!" ) );
6620 return it->type->charges_to_use();
6621 }
6622 item &mc = *loc;
6623
6624 if( !mc.has_flag( "MC_MOBILE" ) ) {
6625 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This is not a compatible memory card." ) );
6626 return it->type->charges_to_use();
6627 }
6628
6629 init_memory_card_with_random_stuff( mc );
6630
6631 if( mc.has_flag( "MC_ENCRYPTED" ) ) {
6632 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This memory card is encrypted." ) );
6633 return it->type->charges_to_use();
6634 }
6635 if( !mc.has_flag( "MC_HAS_DATA" ) ) {
6636 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This memory card does not contain any new data." ) );
6637 return it->type->charges_to_use();
6638 }
6639
6640 einkpc_download_memory_card( *p, *it, mc );
6641
6642 return it->type->charges_to_use();
6643 }
6644
6645 if( ei_decrypt == choice ) {
6646 p->moves -= to_moves<int>( 2_seconds );
6647 if( you != nullptr ) {
6648 loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( filter, *you, title );
6649 }
6650 if( !loc ) {
6651 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have that item!" ) );
6652 return it->type->charges_to_use();
6653 }
6654 item &mc = *loc;
6655
6656 if( !mc.has_flag( "MC_MOBILE" ) ) {
6657 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This is not a compatible memory card." ) );
6658 return it->type->charges_to_use();
6659 }
6660
6661 init_memory_card_with_random_stuff( mc );
6662
6663 if( !mc.has_flag( "MC_ENCRYPTED" ) ) {
6664 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This memory card is not encrypted." ) );
6665 return it->type->charges_to_use();
6666 }
6667
6668 p->practice( skill_computer, rng( 2, 5 ) );
6669
6670 /** @EFFECT_INT increases chance of safely decrypting memory card */
6671
6672 /** @EFFECT_COMPUTER increases chance of safely decrypting memory card */
6673 const int success = p->get_skill_level( skill_computer ) * rng( 1,
6674 p->get_skill_level( skill_computer ) ) *
6675 rng( 1, p->int_cur ) - rng( 30, 80 );
6676 if( success > 0 ) {
6677 p->practice( skill_computer, rng( 5, 10 ) );
6678 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You successfully decrypted content on %s!" ),
6679 mc.tname() );
6680 einkpc_download_memory_card( *p, *it, mc );
6681 } else {
6682 if( success > -10 || one_in( 5 ) ) {
6683 p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You failed to decrypt the %s." ), mc.tname() );
6684 } else {
6685 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
6686 _( "You tripped the firmware protection, and the card deleted its data!" ) );
6687 mc.clear_vars();
6688 mc.unset_flags();
6689 mc.convert( itype_mobile_memory_card_used );
6690 }
6691 }
6692 return it->type->charges_to_use();
6693 }
6694 }
6695 return 0;
6696}

2888 return false;
2889 }

2925 }
2926 moves = moves * ( 10 - helpers.size() ) / 10;
2927

3843{
3844 time_duration timer = it->age();
3845 if( timer < 2_turns ) {
3846 sounds::sound( pos, 0, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "ssss" ), true, "misc", "lit_fuse" );

3848 } else if( it->charges > 0 ) {

◆ fish_trap()

int iuse::fish_trap ( player *  p,
item *  it,

const tripoint &  pos 
)
Survival randomly increases number of fish caught in fishing trap

Definition at line 1790 of file iuse.cpp.

1791{
1792 if( !t ) {
1793 // Handle deploying fish trap.
1794 if( it->active ) {
1795 it->active = false;
1796 return 0;
1797 }
1798
1799 if( it->charges < 0 ) {
1800 it->charges = 0;
1801 return 0;
1802 }
1803 if( p->is_mounted() ) {
1804 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
1805 return 0;
1806 }
1807 if( p->is_underwater() ) {
1808 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
1809 return 0;
1810 }
1811
1812 if( it->charges == 0 ) {
1813 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Fish are not foolish enough to go in here without bait." ) );
1814 return 0;
1815 }
1816
1817 const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Put fish trap where?" ) );
1818 if( !pnt_ ) {
1819 return 0;
1820 }
1821 const tripoint pnt = *pnt_;
1822
1823 if( !g->m.has_flag( "FISHABLE", pnt ) ) {
1824 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't fish there!" ) );
1825 return 0;
1826 }
1827 if( !good_fishing_spot( pnt ) ) {
1828 return 0;
1829 }
1830 it->active = true;
1831 it->set_age( 0_turns );
1832 g->m.add_item_or_charges( pnt, *it );
1833 p->i_rem( it );
1834 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1835 _( "You place the fish trap, in three hours or so you may catch some fish." ) );
1836
1837 return 0;
1838
1839 } else {
1840 // Handle processing fish trap over time.
1841 if( it->charges == 0 ) {
1842 it->active = false;
1843 return 0;
1844 }
1845 if( it->age() > 3_hours ) {
1846 it->active = false;
1847
1848 if( !g->m.has_flag( "FISHABLE", pos ) ) {
1849 return 0;
1850 }
1851
1852 int success = -50;
1853 const int surv = p->get_skill_level( skill_survival );
1854 const int attempts = rng( it->charges, it->charges * it->charges );
1855 for( int i = 0; i < attempts; i++ ) {
1856 /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL randomly increases number of fish caught in fishing trap */
1857 success += rng( surv, surv * surv );
1858 }
1859
1860 it->charges = rng( -1, it->charges );
1861 if( it->charges < 0 ) {
1862 it->charges = 0;
1863 }
1864
1865 int fishes = 0;
1866
1867 if( success < 0 ) {
1868 fishes = 0;
1869 } else if( success < 300 ) {
1870 fishes = 1;
1871 } else if( success < 1500 ) {
1872 fishes = 2;
1873 } else {
1874 fishes = rng( 3, 5 );
1875 }
1876
1877 if( fishes == 0 ) {
1878 it->charges = 0;
1879 p->practice( skill_survival, rng( 5, 15 ) );
1880
1881 return 0;
1882 }
1883
1884 //get the fishables around the trap's spot
1885 std::unordered_set<tripoint> fishable_locations = g->get_fishable_locations( 60, pos );
1886 std::vector<monster *> fishables = g->get_fishable_monsters( fishable_locations );
1887 for( int i = 0; i < fishes; i++ ) {
1888 p->practice( skill_survival, rng( 3, 10 ) );
1889 if( !fishables.empty() ) {
1890 monster *chosen_fish = random_entry( fishables );
1891 // reduce the abstract fish_population marker of that fish
1892 chosen_fish->fish_population -= 1;
1893 if( chosen_fish->fish_population <= 0 ) {
1894 g->catch_a_monster( chosen_fish, pos, p, 300_hours ); //catch the fish!
1895 } else {
1896 g->m.add_item_or_charges( pos, item::make_corpse( chosen_fish->type->id,
1897 calendar::turn + rng( 0_turns,
1898 3_hours ) ) );
1899 }
1900 } else {
1901 //there will always be a chance that the player will get lucky and catch a fish
1902 //not existing in the fishables vector. (maybe it was in range, but wandered off)
1903 //lets say it is a 5% chance per fish to catch
1904 if( one_in( 20 ) ) {
1905 const std::vector<mtype_id> fish_group = MonsterGroupManager::GetMonstersFromGroup(
1906 GROUP_FISH );
1907 const mtype_id &fish_mon = random_entry_ref( fish_group );
1908 //Yes, we can put fishes in the trap like knives in the boot,
1909 //and then get fishes via activation of the item,
1910 //but it's not as comfortable as if you just put fishes in the same tile with the trap.
1911 //Also: corpses and comestibles do not rot in containers like this, but on the ground they will rot.
1912 //we don't know when it was caught so use a random turn
1913 g->m.add_item_or_charges( pos, item::make_corpse( fish_mon, it->birthday() + rng( 0_turns,
1914 3_hours ) ) );
1915 break; //this can happen only once
1916 }
1917 }
1918 }
1919 }
1920 return 0;
1921 }
1922}

657{

662
663 const bool has_fungus = p->has_effect( effect_fungus );
664 const bool has_spores = p->has_effect( effect_spores );
665
666 if( p->is_npc() && !has_fungus && !has_spores ) {
667 return 0;
668 }
669
670 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You use your fungicide." ), _( "<npcname> uses some fungicide" ) );
671 if( has_fungus && ( one_in( 3 ) ) ) {
672 p->remove_effect( effect_fungus );
673 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
674 _( "You feel a burning sensation under your skin that quickly fades away." ) );
675 }
676 if( has_spores && ( one_in( 2 ) ) ) {
677 if( !p->has_effect( effect_fungus ) ) {
678 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Your skin grows warm for a moment." ) );
679 }
680 p->remove_effect( effect_spores );
681 int spore_count = rng( 1, 6 );
682 for( const tripoint &dest : g->m.points_in_radius( p->pos(), 1 ) ) {
683 if( spore_count == 0 ) {
684 break;
685 }
686 if( dest == p->pos() ) {
687 continue;
688 }
689 if( g->m.passable( dest ) && !get_map().obstructed_by_vehicle_rotation( p->pos(), dest ) &&
690 x_in_y( spore_count, 8 ) ) {
691 if( monster *const mon_ptr = g->critter_at<monster>( dest ) ) {
692 monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
693 if( g->u.sees( dest ) &&
694 !critter.type->in_species( FUNGUS ) ) {
695 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The %s is covered in tiny spores!" ),
696 critter.name() );
697 }
698 if( !critter.make_fungus() ) {
699 critter.die( p ); // counts as kill by player
700 }
701 } else {
702 g->place_critter_at( mon_spore, dest );
703 }
704 spore_count--;
705 }
706 }
707 }
708 return it->type->charges_to_use();
709}

4337{
4338 if( t ) { // Normal use
4339 if( p->is_worn( *it ) ) {
4340 // calculate amount of absorbed gas per filter charge
4341 const field &gasfield = g->m.field_at( pos );
4342 for( auto &dfield : gasfield ) {
4343 const field_entry &entry = dfield.second;
4344 if( entry.get_gas_absorption_factor() > 0 ) {
4345 it->set_var( "gas_absorbed", it->get_var( "gas_absorbed", 0 ) + entry.get_gas_absorption_factor() );
4346 }
4347 }
4348 if( it->get_var( "gas_absorbed", 0 ) >= 100 ) {
4349 it->ammo_consume( 1, p->pos() );
4350 it->set_var( "gas_absorbed", 0 );
4351 }
4352 if( it->charges == 0 ) {
4353 p->add_msg_player_or_npc(
4354 m_bad,
4355 _( "Your %s requires new filter!" ),
4356 _( "<npcname> needs new gas mask filter!" )
4357 , it->tname() );
4358 }
4359 }
4360 } else { // activate
4361 if( it->charges == 0 ) {
4362 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s don't have a filter." ), it->tname() );
4363 } else {
4364 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You prepared your %s." ), it->tname() );
4365 it->active = true;
4366 it->set_var( "overwrite_env_resist", it->get_base_env_resist_w_filter() );
4367 }
4368 }
4369 if( it->charges == 0 ) {
4370 it->set_var( "overwrite_env_resist", 0 );
4371 it->active = false;
4372 }
4373 return it->type->charges_to_use();
4374}

3389{
3390 if( t ) { // Every-turn use when it's on
3391 const int rads = g->m.get_radiation( pos );
3392 if( rads == 0 ) {
3393 return it->type->charges_to_use();
3394 }
3395 std::string description = rads > 50 ? _( "buzzing" ) :
3396 rads > 25 ? _( "rapid clicking" ) : _( "clicking" );

3398 rads > 25 ? _( "geiger_medium" ) : _( "geiger_low" );
3399

3402 // can not hear it, but may have alarmed other creatures
3403 return it->type->charges_to_use();
3404 }
3405 if( rads > 50 ) {
3406 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The geiger counter buzzes intensely." ) );
3407 } else if( rads > 35 ) {
3408 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The geiger counter clicks wildly." ) );
3409 } else if( rads > 25 ) {
3410 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The geiger counter clicks rapidly." ) );
3411 } else if( rads > 15 ) {
3412 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The geiger counter clicks steadily." ) );
3413 } else if( rads > 8 ) {
3414 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The geiger counter clicks slowly." ) );
3415 } else if( rads > 4 ) {
3416 add_msg( _( "The geiger counter clicks intermittently." ) );
3417 } else {
3418 add_msg( _( "The geiger counter clicks once." ) );
3419 }
3420 return it->type->charges_to_use();
3421 }
3422 // Otherwise, we're activating the geiger counter
3423 if( it->typeId() == itype_geiger_on ) {
3424 add_msg( _( "The geiger counter's SCANNING LED turns off." ) );
3425 it->convert( itype_geiger_off ).active = false;
3426 return 0;
3427 }
3428

3430 _( "Scan yourself or other person" ), _( "Scan the ground" ), _( "Turn continuous scan on" )
3431 } );
3432 switch( ch ) {
3433 case 0: {
3434 const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f = [&]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
3435 return g->critter_at<npc>( pnt ) != nullptr || g->critter_at<player>( pnt ) != nullptr;
3436 };
3437
3438 const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight( _( "Scan whom?" ),
3439 _( "There is no one to scan nearby." ), f, false );
3440 if( !pnt_ ) {
3441 return 0;
3442 }
3443 const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
3444 if( pnt == g->u.pos() ) {
3445 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your radiation level: %d mSv (%d mSv from items)" ), p->get_rad(),
3446 p->leak_level( "RADIOACTIVE" ) );
3447 break;
3448 }
3449 if( npc *const person_ = g->critter_at<npc>( pnt ) ) {
3450 npc &person = *person_;
3451 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "%s's radiation level: %d mSv (%d mSv from items)" ),
3452 person.name, person.get_rad(),
3453 person.leak_level( "RADIOACTIVE" ) );
3454 }
3455 break;
3456 }
3457 case 1:
3458 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The ground's radiation level: %d mSv/h" ),
3459 g->m.get_radiation( p->pos() ) );
3460 break;
3461 case 2:
3462 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The geiger counter's scan LED turns on." ) );
3463 it->convert( itype_geiger_on ).active = true;
3464 break;
3465 default:
3466 return 0;
3467 }
3468 p->mod_moves( -100 );
3469
3470 return it->type->charges_to_use();
3471}

4983 &allowed_furn_id]( const tripoint & pnt ) {

4985 return false;
4986 }

5015 } else if( ter == t_window_enhanced || ter == t_window_enhanced_noglass ) {

5017 } else if( ter == t_chainfence || ter == t_chaingate_c ||

5021 moves = to_moves<int>( 15_minutes );
5022 } else {
5023 return 0;
5024 }
5025

5027 p->get_item_position( it ) );
5028 p->activity.placement = pnt;
5029

2366 t_window_boarded,

2368 t_door_boarded,

2373 t_rdoor_boarded_damaged

2375
2376 const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f = [&allowed_ter_id]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
2377 if( pnt == g->u.pos() ) {
2378 return false;
2379 }
2380 const ter_id ter = g->m.ter( pnt );
2381
2382 const bool is_allowed = allowed_ter_id.find( ter ) != allowed_ter_id.end();
2383 return is_allowed;
2384 };

2390 }

2398 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't pry that." ) );
2399 }

2402

2409 act.placement = pnt;
2410 p->assign_activity( act );
2411 return it->type->charges_to_use();
2412 } else {
2413 return 0;
2414 }

9657 translate_marker( "It is certain." ),
9658 translate_marker( "It is decidedly so." ),
9659 translate_marker( "Without a doubt." ),
9660 translate_marker( "Yes - definitely." ),
9661 translate_marker( "You may rely on it." ),

9664 translate_marker( "Outlook good." ),

9673 translate_marker( "My reply is no." ),

9675 translate_marker( "Outlook not so good." ),
9676 translate_marker( "Very doubtful." )

2574 } else {

2576 return 0;

820{
821 /** @EFFECT_STR reduces duration of meth */
822 time_duration duration = 1_minutes * ( 60 - p->str_cur );
823 if( p->has_amount( itype_apparatus, 1 ) && p->use_charges_if_avail( itype_fire, 1 ) ) {
824 p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You smoke your meth." ) );
825 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The world seems to sharpen." ) );
826 p->mod_fatigue( -375 );
827 if( p->has_trait( trait_TOLERANCE ) ) {
828 duration *= 1.2;
829 } else {
830 duration *= ( p->has_trait( trait_LIGHTWEIGHT ) ? 1.8 : 1.5 );
831 }
832 // breathe out some smoke
833 for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
834 g->m.add_field( {p->posx() + static_cast<int>( rng( -2, 2 ) ), p->posy() + static_cast<int>( rng( -2, 2 ) ), p->posz()},
835 fd_methsmoke, 2 );
836 }
837 } else {
838 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You snort some crystal meth." ) );
839 p->mod_fatigue( -300 );
840 }
841 if( !p->has_effect( effect_meth ) ) {
842 duration += 1_hours;
843 }
844 if( duration > 0_turns ) {
845 // meth actually inhibits hunger, weaker characters benefit more
846 /** @EFFECT_STR_MAX >4 experiences less hunger benefit from meth */
847 int hungerpen = ( p->str_max < 5 ? 35 : 40 - ( 2 * p->str_max ) );
848 if( hungerpen > 0 ) {
849 p->mod_stored_kcal( 10 * hungerpen );
850 }
851 p->add_effect( effect_meth, duration );
852 }
853 return it->type->charges_to_use();
854}

5088{

5090 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
5091 return 0;
5092 }
5093 const std::vector<field_type_id> to_check = {
5094 fd_blood,
5095 fd_blood_veggy,
5096 fd_blood_insect,
5097 fd_blood_invertebrate,
5098 fd_gibs_flesh,
5099 fd_gibs_veggy,
5100 fd_gibs_insect,
5101 fd_gibs_invertebrate,
5102 fd_bile,
5103 fd_slime,
5104 fd_sludge
5105 };
5106 const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f = [&to_check]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
5107 if( !g->m.has_flag( "LIQUIDCONT", pnt ) && !g->m.has_flag( "SEALED", pnt ) ) {
5108 map_stack items = g->m.i_at( pnt );
5109 auto found = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
5110 return it.made_of( LIQUID );
5111 } );
5112 if( found != items.end() ) {
5113 return true;
5114 }
5115 }
5116 field &fld = g->m.field_at( pnt );
5117 for( field_type_id fid : to_check ) {
5118 if( fld.find_field_c( fid ) ) {
5119 return true;
5120 }
5121 }
5122 if( const optional_vpart_position vp = g->m.veh_at( pnt ) ) {
5123 vehicle *const veh = &vp->vehicle();
5124 std::vector<int> parts_here = veh->parts_at_relative( vp->mount(), true );
5125 for( int elem : parts_here ) {
5126 if( veh->part( elem ).blood > 0 ) {
5127 return true;
5128 }
5129 vehicle_stack items = veh->get_items( elem );
5130 auto found = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
5131 return it.made_of( LIQUID );
5132 } );
5133 if( found != items.end() ) {
5134 return true;
5135 }
5136 }
5137 }
5138 return false;
5139 };
5140
5141 const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
5142 _( "Mop where?" ), _( "There is nothing to mop nearby." ), f, false );
5143 if( !pnt_ ) {
5144 return 0;
5145 }
5146 const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
5147 if( !f( pnt ) ) {
5148 if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
5149 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You mop yourself up." ) );
5150 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The universe implodes and reforms around you." ) );
5151 } else {
5152 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "There's nothing to mop there." ) );
5153 }
5154 return 0;
5155 }
5156 if( p->is_blind() ) {
5157 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You move the mop around, unsure whether it's doing any good." ) );
5158 p->moves -= 15;
5159 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
5160 g->m.mop_spills( pnt );
5161 }
5162 } else if( g->m.mop_spills( pnt ) ) {
5163 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You mop up the spill." ) );
5164 p->moves -= 15;
5165 } else {
5166 return 0;
5167 }
5168 return it->type->charges_to_use();
5169}

item *  it,
bool  t,
const tripoint &  pos 
)
Intelligence increases chance of checking multi-cooker on time Survival increases chance of checking multi-cooker on time Electronics >3 allows multicooker upgrade Fabrication >3 allows multicooker upgrade Intelligence increases chance to successfully upgrade multi-cooker Electronics increases chance to successfully upgrade multi-cooker Fabrication increases chance to successfully upgrade multi-cooker

4175 sound = music;

1149 std::vector<trait_id> valid; // Which flags the player has
1150 for( auto &traits_iter : mutation_branch::get_all() ) {
1151 if( p->has_trait( traits_iter.id ) && !p->has_base_trait( traits_iter.id ) ) {
1152 //Looks for active mutation
1153 valid.push_back( traits_iter.id );
1154 }
1155 }
1156 if( valid.empty() ) {
1157 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You feel cleansed." ) );
1158 return it->type->charges_to_use();
1159 }
1160 int num_cured = rng( 4,
1161 valid.size() ); //Essentially a double-strength purifier, but guaranteed at least 4. Double-edged and all
1162 if( num_cured > 8 ) {
1163 num_cured = 8;
1164 }
1165 for( int i = 0; i < num_cured && !valid.empty(); i++ ) {
1166 const trait_id id = random_entry_removed( valid );
1167 if( id->purifiable ) {
1168 p->remove_mutation( id );
1169 } else {
1170 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You feel a distinct burning inside, but it passes." ) );
1171 }
1172 if( !( p->has_trait( trait_NOPAIN ) ) ) {
1173 p->mod_pain( 2 * num_cured ); //Hurts worse as it fixes more
1174 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Feels like you're on fire, but you're OK." ) );
1175 }
1176 p->mod_stored_nutr( 2 * num_cured );
1177 p->mod_thirst( 2 * num_cured );
1178 p->mod_fatigue( 2 * num_cured );
1179 }
1180 return it->type->charges_to_use();

1186 mutagen_common_checks( *p, *it, false, mutagen_technique::injected_smart_purifier );
1187 if( !checks.allowed ) {
1188 return checks.charges_used;
1189 }
1190
1191 std::vector<trait_id> valid; // Which flags the player has
1192 std::vector<std::string> valid_names; // Which flags the player has
1193 for( auto &traits_iter : mutation_branch::get_all() ) {
1194 if( p->has_trait( traits_iter.id ) &&
1195 !p->has_base_trait( traits_iter.id ) &&
1196 traits_iter.id->purifiable ) {
1197 //Looks for active mutation
1198 valid.push_back( traits_iter.id );
1199 valid_names.push_back( traits_iter.id->name() );
1200 }
1201 }
1202 if( valid.empty() ) {
1203 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You don't have any mutations to purify." ) );
1204 return 0;
1205 }
1206
1207 int mutation_index = uilist( _( "Choose a mutation to purify" ), valid_names );
1208 if( mutation_index < 0 ) {
1209 return 0;
1210 }
1211
1212 p->add_msg_if_player(
1213 _( "You inject the purifier. The liquid thrashes inside the tube and goes down reluctantly." ) );
1214
1215 p->remove_mutation( valid[mutation_index] );
1216 valid.erase( valid.begin() + mutation_index );
1217
1218 // and one or two more untargeted purifications.
1219 if( !valid.empty() ) {
1220 p->remove_mutation( random_entry_removed( valid ) );
1221 }
1222 if( !valid.empty() && one_in( 2 ) ) {
1223 p->remove_mutation( random_entry_removed( valid ) );
1224 }
1225
1226 p->mod_pain( 3 );
1227
1228 item syringe( "syringe", it->birthday() );
1229 p->i_add( syringe );
1230 return it->type->charges_to_use();
1231}

1670 } );

1685 colorname = _( "\"Green\"" );

1694 }

2990 vehicle *v = nullptr;

2992 for( const tripoint &pos : g->m.points_in_radius( g->u.pos(), 1 ) ) {
2993 const optional_vpart_position vp = g->m.veh_at( pos );
2994 if( !vp ) {
2995 continue;

2999 v = vfound;
3000 } else {
3001 //found more than one vehicle?
3002 if( v != vfound ) {
3003 v = nullptr;
3004 found_more_than_one = true;
3005 break;
3006 }
3007 }
3008 }
3009 if( found_more_than_one ) {

3011 _( "Siphon from where?" ), _( "There is nothing to siphon nearby." ), f, false );
3012 if( !pnt_ ) {
3013 return 0;
3014 }

3016 if( vp ) {
3017 v = &vp->vehicle();
3018 }
3019 }
3020

3022 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's no vehicle there." ) );
3023 return 0;

559 cig.item_counter = to_turns<int>( 12_minutes );
560 p->mod_thirst( 3 );
561 p->mod_stored_kcal( 40 );
562 } else if( it->typeId() == itype_joint ) {
563 cig = item( "joint_lit", calendar::turn );
564 cig.item_counter = to_turns<int>( 4_minutes );
565 p->mod_stored_kcal( -40 );
566 p->mod_thirst( 6 );
567 if( p->get_painkiller() < 5 ) {
568 p->set_painkiller( ( p->get_painkiller() + 3 ) * 2 );
569 }
570 } else {
571 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
572 _( "Please let the devs know you should be able to smoke a %s but the smoking code does not know how." ),
573 it->tname() );
574 return 0;
575 }
576 // If we're here, we better have a cig to light.
577 p->use_charges_if_avail( itype_fire, 1 );
578 cig.active = true;
579 p->inv.add_item( cig, false, true );
580 p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You light a %s." ), cig.tname() );
581
582 // Parting messages
583 if( it->typeId() == itype_joint ) {
584 // Would group with the joint, but awkward to mutter before lighting up.
585 if( one_in( 5 ) ) {
586 weed_msg( *p );
587 }
588 }
589 if( p->get_effect_dur( effect_cig ) > 10_minutes * ( p->addiction_level(
590 add_type::CIG ) + 1 ) ) {
591 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Ugh, too much smoke you feel nasty." ) );
592 }
593
594 return it->type->charges_to_use();
595}

◆ toolmod_attach()

int iuse::toolmod_attach ( player *  p,
item *  it,
bool  ,
const tripoint &   
)

Definition at line 5931 of file iuse.cpp.

5932{
5933 if( !it || !it->is_toolmod() ) {
5934 debugmsg( "tried to attach non-toolmod" );
5935 return 0;
5936 }
5937
5938 if( !p ) {
5939 return 0;
5940 }
5941
5942 auto filter = [&it]( const item & e ) {
5943 // don't allow ups battery mods on a UPS or UPS-powered tools
5944 if( it->has_flag( "USE_UPS" ) &&
5945 ( e.typeId() == itype_UPS_off || e.typeId() == itype_adv_UPS_off ||
5946 e.has_flag( "USE_UPS" ) ) ) {
5947 return false;
5948 }
5949
5950 // can only attach to unmodified tools that use compatible ammo
5951 return e.is_tool() && e.toolmods().empty() && !e.magazine_current() &&
5952 std::any_of( it->type->mod->acceptable_ammo.begin(),
5953 it->type->mod->acceptable_ammo.end(), [&]( const ammotype & at ) {
5954 return e.ammo_types( false ).count( at );
5955 } );
5956 };
5957
5958 auto loc = g->inv_map_splice( filter, _( "Select tool to modify" ), 1,
5959 _( "You don't have compatible tools." ) );
5960
5961 if( !loc ) {
5962 add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
5963 return 0;
5964 }
5965
5966 if( loc->ammo_remaining() ) {
5967 if( !p->unload( loc ) ) {
5968 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cancel unloading the tool." ) );
5969 return 0;
5970 }
5971 }
5972
5973 p->toolmod_add( std::move( loc ), item_location( *p, it ) );
5974 return 0;
5975}
player::toolmod_add
void toolmod_add(item_location tool, item_location mod)

8706 }
8707 const tripoint posp = *posp_;
8708 const optional_vpart_position vp = g->m.veh_at( posp );
8709 if( !vp ) {
8710 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There's no vehicle there." ) );
8711 return 0;
8712 } else {
8713 vehicle *const source_veh = veh_pointer_or_null( vp );
8714 if( source_veh ) {
8715 if( source_veh->has_tow_attached() || source_veh->is_towed() ||
8716 source_veh->is_towing() ) {
8717 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "That vehicle already has a tow-line attached." ) );
8718 return 0;
8719 }
8720 if( !source_veh->is_external_part( posp ) ) {
8721 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't attach the tow-line to an internal part." ) );
8722 return 0;
8723 }
8724 }
8725 const tripoint &abspos = g->m.getabs( posp );
8726 it->set_var( "source_x", abspos.x );
8727 it->set_var( "source_y", abspos.y );
8728 it->set_var( "source_z", g->get_levz() );
8729 set_cable_active( p, it, "pay_out_cable" );
8730 }
8731 } else {
8732 const auto confirm_source_vehicle = []( player * p, item * it, const bool detach_if_missing ) {
8733 tripoint source_global( it->get_var( "source_x", 0 ),
8734 it->get_var( "source_y", 0 ),
8735 it->get_var( "source_z", 0 ) );
8736 tripoint source_local = g->m.getlocal( source_global );
8737 const optional_vpart_position source_vp = g->m.veh_at( source_local );
8738 vehicle *const source_veh = veh_pointer_or_null( source_vp );
8739 if( detach_if_missing && source_veh == nullptr ) {
8740 if( p->has_item( *it ) ) {
8741 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You notice the cable has come loose!" ) );
8742 }
8743 it->reset_cable( p );
8744 }
8745 return source_vp;
8746 };
8747
8748 const bool paying_out = initial_state == "pay_out_cable";
8749 uilist kmenu;
8750 kmenu.text = _( "Using cable:" );
8751 kmenu.addentry( 0, true, -1, _( "Detach and re-spool the cable" ) );
8752 kmenu.addentry( 1, paying_out, -1, _( "Attach loose end to vehicle" ) );
8753
8754 kmenu.query();
8755 int choice = kmenu.ret;
8756
8757 if( choice < 0 ) {
8758 return 0; // we did nothing.
8759 } else if( choice == 0 ) { // unconnect & respool
8760 it->reset_cable( p );
8761 return 0;
8762 }
8763 const optional_vpart_position source_vp = confirm_source_vehicle( p, it, paying_out );
8764 vehicle *const source_veh = veh_pointer_or_null( source_vp );
8765 if( source_veh == nullptr && paying_out ) {
8766 return 0;
8767 }
8768 const cata::optional<tripoint> vpos_ = choose_adjacent(
8769 _( "Attach cable to vehicle that will be towed." ) );
8770 if( !vpos_ ) {
8771 return 0;
8772 }
8773 const tripoint vpos = *vpos_;
8774
8775 const optional_vpart_position target_vp = g->m.veh_at( vpos );
8776 if( !target_vp ) {
8777 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There's no vehicle there." ) );
8778 return 0;
8779 } else {
8780 vehicle *const target_veh = &target_vp->vehicle();
8781 if( target_veh && ( target_veh->has_tow_attached() || target_veh->is_towed() ||
8782 target_veh->is_towing() ) ) {
8783 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "That vehicle already has a tow-line attached." ) );
8784 return 0;
8785 }
8786 if( source_veh == target_veh ) {
8787 if( p->has_item( *it ) ) {
8788 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You cannot set a vehicle to tow itself!" ) );
8789 }
8790 return 0;
8791 }
8792 if( !target_veh->is_external_part( vpos ) ) {
8793 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't attach the tow-line to an internal part." ) );
8794 return 0;
8795 }
8796 const vpart_id vpid( it->typeId().str() );
8797 point vcoords = source_vp->mount();
8798 vehicle_part source_part( vpid, vcoords, item( *it ) );
8799 source_veh->install_part( vcoords, source_part );
8800 vcoords = target_vp->mount();
8801 vehicle_part target_part( vpid, vcoords, item( *it ) );
8802 target_veh->install_part( vcoords, target_part );
8803
8804 if( p->has_item( *it ) ) {
8805 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You link up the %1$s and the %2$s." ),
8806 source_veh->name, target_veh->name );
8807 }
8808 source_veh->tow_data.set_towing( source_veh, target_veh );
8809 return 1; // Let the cable be destroyed.
8810 }
8811 }
8812
8813 return 0;
8814}

5565{
5566 if( t ) {
5567 // Continuous usage, do nothing as not initiated by the player, this is for
5568 // wet towels only as they are active items.

5570 }

5572 bool boom = p->has_effect( effect_boomered );
5573 bool glow = p->has_effect( effect_glowing );
5574 int mult = slime + boom + glow; // cleaning off more than one at once makes it take longer
5575 bool towelUsed = false;

5577
5578 // can't use an already wet towel!

5581 it->tname() );
5582 // clean off the messes first, more important

5585 p->remove_effect( effect_boomered );

5611

5614 if( mult == 0 ) {
5615 mult = 1;
5616 }
5617 p->moves -= 50 * mult;

5621 it->convert( itype_towel_wet );
5622 }

5625 it->set_flag( "WET" );
5626 it->active = true;
5627 }
5628 }

9423 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You're carrying too much to clean anything." ) );
9424 return 0;
9425 }
9426
9427 wash_items( p, false, true );
9428 return 0;
9429}

9105

9108 p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "The %s's monitor slowly outputs the data" ),
9109 it->tname() );
9110 }
9111 if( it->has_flag( "THERMOMETER" ) ) {
9112 if( it->typeId() == itype_thermometer ) {
9113 p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "The %1$s reads %2$s." ), it->tname(),
9114 print_temperature( player_local_temp ) );
9115 } else {

9117 print_temperature( player_local_temp ) );
9118 }
9119 // TODO: Don't output air temp if we aren't near air

9122 tripoint_abs_ms( here.getabs( p->pos() ) ),
9123 calendar::turn, calendar::config, g->get_seed() );
9124 p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "Water temperature: %s." ),
9125 print_temperature( water_temp ) );
9126 }
9127 }

9129 if( it->typeId() == itype_hygrometer ) {

9131 m_neutral, _( "The %1$s reads %2$s." ), it->tname(),
9132 print_humidity( get_local_humidity( weatherPoint.humidity, get_weather().weather_id,

9136 m_neutral, _( "Relative Humidity: %s." ),
9137 print_humidity( get_local_humidity( weatherPoint.humidity, get_weather().weather_id,
9138 g->is_sheltered( p->pos() ) ) ) );
9139 }
9140 }

9144 m_neutral, _( "The %1$s reads %2$s." ), it->tname(),
9145 print_pressure( static_cast<int>( weatherPoint.pressure ) ) );
9146 } else {
9147 p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "Pressure: %s." ),
9148 print_pressure( static_cast<int>( weatherPoint.pressure ) ) );
9149 }
9150 }
9151
9152 if( it->typeId() == itype_weather_reader ) {
9153 int vehwindspeed = 0;
9154 if( optional_vpart_position vp = g->m.veh_at( p->pos() ) ) {
9155 vehwindspeed = std::abs( vp->vehicle().velocity / 100 ); // For mph
9156 }
9157 const oter_id &cur_om_ter = overmap_buffer.ter( p->global_omt_location() );
9158 /* windpower defined in internal velocity units (=.01 mph) */
9159 const double windpower = 100 * get_local_windpower( weather.windspeed + vehwindspeed, cur_om_ter,
9160 p->pos(), weather.winddirection, g->is_sheltered( p->pos() ) );
9161
9162 p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "Wind Speed: %.1f %s." ),
9163 convert_velocity( windpower, VU_WIND ),
9164 velocity_units( VU_WIND ) );
9165 p->add_msg_if_player(
9166 m_neutral, _( "Feels Like: %s." ),
9167 print_temperature(
9168 get_local_windchill( units::to_fahrenheit( weatherPoint.temperature ),
9169 weatherPoint.humidity,
9170 windpower / 100 ) +
9171 player_local_temp ) );
9172 std::string dirstring = get_dirstring( weather.winddirection );
9173 p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "Wind Direction: From the %s." ), dirstring );
9174 }
9175
9176 return 0;
9177}
